data.lyric:
[ti:Toxic (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.44]Toxic (Explicit) - Polo G
[00:01.13]Lyrics by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:01.85]Composed by：Taurus Bartlett
[00:02.58]
[00:10.14]Uh uh uh
[00:11.51]Harry Harry Potter
[00:12.02]Baby I'm a soldier you won't find nobody solider
[00:14.81]Love that b***h so much I caught her cheatin' would've shot at her
[00:17.56]F**k broken hearts
[00:18.36]Keep stuffin' all these hundreds 'til my pockets hurt
[00:20.69]I just go by morals I don't care 'bout who more popular
[00:23.67]Heard his ho went missin' she with gang like we adopted her
[00:26.64]Got a low-key freak I save her pics but I don't follow her
[00:29.59]Lil Cap he got heat the type of heat that break thermometers
[00:32.57]Way far from my peak and where I started took a lot of work
[00:35.56]When I turned eighteen
[00:36.49]I tried to see how much my block was worth
[00:38.58]Right on Evergreen with Glocks on edge b***h we on opp alert
[00:41.55]Same n***as hatin' out there watchin' with binoculars
[00:44.43]Legends never die you the reason I stopped poppin' Percs
[00:47.40]
[00:48.13]All she say is "Boy you so selfish"
[00:50.74]I told her "Baby I'm a gangster I can't help it"
[00:53.72]Uh and I'm with them members really melt s**t
[00:56.69]In the ground every n***a that we dealt with
[00:59.29]Uh
[00:59.71]Pipe it up feel the beat and let that bass knock
[01:02.55]He get left right in the streets when that K rock
[01:05.57]Fireworks got some s**t that make your face drop
[01:08.53]When lil' Hot 'nem they get started they just can't stop
[01:10.90]A lil' white boy from the 'burbs got the nerve
[01:12.88]To tell me I ain't goin' hard enough
[01:14.89]Like he really ever had it hard enough
[01:17.10]Like b***h don't get me started up
[01:18.45]
[01:19.27]I'm still gon' be right here
[01:20.45]If the rap game clean the garbage up
[01:22.11]Can't bar for nothin'
[01:23.17]I'm with some renegades Draco beatin' feel the bass
[01:25.92].223s hit his face tactical won't leave a trace
[01:29.25]I was thuggin' grandma hopin' that this s**t a phase
[01:32.16]Twenty chains six figures just to hit the stage
[01:34.86]
[01:35.55]All she say is "Boy you so selfish"
[01:37.97]I told her "Baby I'm a gangster I can't help it"
[01:40.57]
[01:41.16]Uh and I'm with them members really melt s**t
[01:44.09]In the ground every n***a that we dealt with
[01:46.78]Uh
[01:47.21]Pipe it up feel the beat and let that bass knock
[01:50.03]He get left right in the streets when that K rock
[01:52.96]Fireworks got some s**t that make your face drop
[01:55.95]When lil' Hot 'nem they get started they just can't stop
data.trans:
[ti:Toxic (Explicit)]
[ar:Polo G]
[al:Hall of Fame (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.38]//
[00:06.76]//
[00:10.14]//
[00:11.51]//
[00:12.02]宝贝 我是个战士 你找不到比我更坚强的人
[00:14.81]深爱着那女人 我抓到她出轨 我已经杀掉了她
[00:17.56]心碎不已
[00:18.36]不停赚钱塞到包里 直到口袋都被撑破
[00:20.69]我以德服人 我不在乎谁更受欢迎
[00:23.67]听说他的女人失踪了 她跟帮派混在一起 好像我们收养了她
[00:26.64]得到了一个低调的疯子 我存了她的照片 但没有关注她
[00:29.59]Lil Cap 他名声大噪 大红大紫
[00:32.57]距离我的巅峰和我的起点都很远 我付出了巨大的努力
[00:35.56]在我十八岁那年
[00:36.49]我试图弄清楚我的街区是什么水平
[00:38.58]带上格洛克走到Evergreen 紧张不安 我们遇上了对家
[00:41.55]同一伙仇人在外面拿着望远镜虎视眈眈
[00:44.43]传奇永不灭 因为你 我不再服用那种药物
[00:47.40]
[00:48.13]她口中就只有一句 男孩 你太自私了
[00:50.74]我告诉她 宝贝 我是黑帮的 我身不由己
[00:53.72]跟他们一起 我们真的无所不能
[00:56.69]在地下 我们能解决掉每一个人
[00:59.29]//
[00:59.71]躁起来 感受这节拍 让低音奏响
[01:02.55]当音乐响起 他在街上摇摆起来
[01:05.57]烟花绽放 让你低下头
[01:08.53]只要有点名气 他们会乘胜追击 他们无可阻挡
[01:10.90]来自郊区的白人小伙有胆子
[01:12.88]跟我说 我还不够努力
[01:14.89]好像他真的过过苦日子似的
[01:17.10]碧池 不要让我怼回去
[01:18.45]
[01:19.27]如果说唱游戏能把垃圾清理干净 
[01:20.45]我依然会继续唱下去
[01:22.11]不能为了无意义的东西写词
[01:23.17]我身边有一些叛徒 开枪扫射 感受这节拍
[01:25.92]直击他的面庞 擅长筹谋 不会留下痕迹
[01:29.25]我在打架斗殴 外婆希望过段时间我就不会这样
[01:32.16]二十条金链子 无数钞票 只为了炸裂舞台
[01:34.86]
[01:35.55]她口中就只有一句 男孩 你太自私了
[01:37.97]我告诉她 宝贝 我是黑帮的 我身不由己
[01:40.57]
[01:41.16]跟他们一起 我们真的无所不能
[01:44.09]在地下 我们能解决掉每一个人
[01:46.78]//
[01:47.21]躁起来 感受这节拍 让低音奏响
[01:50.03]当音乐响起 他在街上摇摆起来
[01:52.96]烟花绽放 让你低下头
[01:55.95]只要有点名气 他们会乘胜追击 他们无可阻挡
